data.eml:eml: Identity and distribution of Celoniteshermon Gusenleitner, 2002 (Hymenoptera, Vespidae, Masarinae) from the Middle East with a description of the hitherto unknown male

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mauss, Volker, Prosi, Rainer (2018): Identity and distribution of Celoniteshermon Gusenleitner, 2002 (Hymenoptera, Vespidae, Masarinae) from the Middle East with a description of the hitherto unknown male. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 66: 55-70, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.66.29795, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.66.29795
